meanings.definition: An example that refutes or disproves a statement or proposition.
meanings.sent1: She provided a counterexample to show that the theory was incorrect.
meanings.sent2: The scientist used a counterexample to demonstrate why the hypothesis was flawed.
meanings.sent3: The counterexample made everyone rethink their assumptions.
meanings.sent4: His experiment served as a powerful counterexample to the widely accepted belief.
meanings.sent5: The counterexample stood out as a clear contradiction to the original claim.
